channel.title: Diaries on Think Code Make Loop
channel.description: Recent content in Diaries on Think Code Make Loop

item.description: Today I get up at nearly 8 o’clock as usual. I Cooked some sauage and eggs as breakfast. After we finish breakfast, We finally managed to play badminton in the community which my wife was planning to for a few days. We were enjoying it for about ten minutes, before it started to rain. ‘Cause it has been a long time since we play badminton last time. But I still need to go to work.
